sql.query:
SELECT *
FROM charges_family AS charges_family
WHERE family_uuid = :P1 /* {{$_GET.family_uuid}} */
ORDER BY chargeFor_monthly DESC, chargeFor_session DESC

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(pe.amount),0) AS paid, cf.total AS charge_total, (cf.total - IFNULL(SUM(pe.amount),0)) AS owing
FROM charges_family cf
    LEFT JOIN charges_enrolments ce ON cf.uuid = ce.charge_uuid
    LEFT JOIN payments_enrolcharges pe ON ce.uuid = pe.enrolcharge_uuid
    LEFT JOIN payments_familycharges pf ON pf.uuid = pe.payment_uuid
WHERE cf.uuid = :P1;

SELECT :TZ > cf.dueDate as overdue
FROM charges_family cf
WHERE cf.uuid = :P1
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
    SUM(pe.amount) as towards_current_charge,
    pf.amount as total_payment_amount,
    pf.uuid as payment_uuid,
    pf.title,
    IFNULL(pf.paymentType, 'STRIPE') as paymentType,
    pf.paymentdate
FROM
    payments_familycharges pf
    LEFT JOIN payments_enrolcharges pe on pf.uuid = pe.payment_uuid
    LEFT JOIN charges_enrolments ce ON pe.enrolcharge_uuid = ce.uuid
    LEFT JOIN charges_family cf on ce.charge_uuid = cf.uuid
WHERE JSON_SEARCH((
    SELECT cf.payments
    FROM charges_family cf
    WHERE cf.uuid = :P1
    ),'all', pf.uuid) AND cf.uuid = :P1
GROUP BY
    pf.uuid,
    pf.amount,
    pf.paymentdate
ORDER BY pf.paymentdate DESC;

SELECT payments_enrolcharges.payment_uuid, payments_enrolcharges.amount, students.firstName AS studentFirst, students.lastName AS studentLast, charges_enrolments.classDate, charges_enrolments.enrolsubtotal, days.name AS dayName, classes.startTimeDisplay, classLevels.name AS levelName, staff.firstName AS instructorFirst, staff.lastName AS instructorLast, charges_enrolments.ennetrate, payments_enrolcharges.payment_uuid AS payment_uuid
FROM payments_enrolcharges
INNER JOIN students ON (students.uuid = payments_enrolcharges.student_uuid) INNER JOIN charges_enrolments ON (charges_enrolments.uuid = payments_enrolcharges.enrolcharge_uuid) INNER JOIN classes ON (classes.uuid = charges_enrolments.class_uuid) INNER JOIN classLevels ON (classLevels.uuid = classes.classlevel_uuid) INNER JOIN staff ON (staff.uuid = classes.instructor_uuid) INNER JOIN days ON (days.id = classes.day)
WHERE payments_enrolcharges.payment_uuid = :P1 /* {{payment_uuid}} */ AND charges_enrolments.charge_uuid = :P2 /* {{chargeuuid}} */
ORDER BY students.firstName ASC, students.lastName ASC, charges_enrolments.classDate ASC

SELECT
       s.uuid AS student_uuid,
       s.firstName,
       s.lastName,
       COUNT(ce.enrolment_uuid) AS enrolments_count,
       SUM(ce.enrolgrandtotal) AS enrolments_charge_total
FROM students s JOIN charges_enrolments ce ON s.uuid = ce.student_uuid
WHERE s.family = :P1 AND ce.charge_uuid = :P2
GROUP BY s.id, s.firstName, s.lastName;

SELECT DISTINCT SUM(charges_enrolments.enrolgrandtotal) AS enrolTotal, SUM(charges_enrolments.enrolsubtotal) AS classTotal, charges_enrolments.enrolid, charges_enrolments.uuid AS charge_enrolment_uuid, charges_enrolments.charge_uuid AS charge_uuid, enrolments.uuid AS enrolment_uuid, enrolments.student, enrolments.startDate, enrolments.dropDate, classes.startTimeDisplay AS classStartTime, classes.endTimeDisplay AS classEndTime, classLevels.name AS classLevelName, days.name AS classDay, staff.firstName AS instructorFirst, staff.lastName AS instructorLast, charges_enrolments.classId, charges_enrolments.classDate, charges_enrolments.classDate2
FROM charges_enrolments
LEFT JOIN enrolments ON (enrolments.id = charges_enrolments.enrolid) INNER JOIN classes ON (classes.id = charges_enrolments.classId) INNER JOIN classLevels ON (classLevels.id = classes.classLevel) INNER JOIN days ON (days.id = classes.day) INNER JOIN staff ON (staff.id = classes.instructor)
WHERE charges_enrolments.charge_uuid = :P1 /* {{chargeuuid}} */ AND charges_enrolments.student_uuid = :P2 /* {{student_uuid}} */
GROUP BY charges_enrolments.enrolid, charges_enrolments.uuid, charges_enrolments.charge_uuid, enrolments.uuid, enrolments.student, enrolments.startDate, enrolments.dropDate, classes.startTimeDisplay, classes.endTimeDisplay, classLevels.name, days.name, staff.firstName, staff.lastName, charges_enrolments.classId, charges_enrolments.classDate, charges_enrolments.classDate2

SELECT DISTINCT *
FROM charges_enrolments
WHERE charge_uuid = :P1 /* {{chargeuuid}} */ AND enrolment_uuid = :P2 /* {{enrolment_uuid}} */

SELECT *
FROM charges_family cf 
WHERE JSON_SEARCH(cf.payments, 'all', :P1)

SELECT payments_enrolcharges.uuid AS payment_enrolcharge_uuid, payments_enrolcharges.amount AS payment_amount
FROM charges_enrolments
LEFT JOIN payments_enrolcharges ON (payments_enrolcharges.enrolcharge_uuid = charges_enrolments.uuid)
WHERE charges_enrolments.charge_uuid = :P1 /* {{uuid}} */ AND payments_enrolcharges.payment_uuid = :P2 /* {{payment_uuid}} */
